(Simplified: 帜)
Pictophonetic: 戠 indicates the sound; 巾 (curtain) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 巾 [ jīn ] cloth, curtain, handkerchief, towel
    • 戠 [ zhī ] sword; potter's clay; to gather
heisig_chinese_memo: The kazoo fiesta noise is audible from far away and they fashioned streamers out of towels for beckoning visitors in.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The kazoo fiesta noise is audible from far away and they fashioned streamers out of towels for beckoning visitors in.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " scarf " and "戠", the original meaning is banner. "Said Wen": "The banner belongs to the banner. From the towel, the sound of the warrior." "Mozi‧ Banner": "The pavilion is two feet and five feet long, and the silk is five feet long, and the width is half the size."

" Zhang " also means a sign. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty-Yu Xu Biography": "I also subtly send out those who can sew by the poor, and the servants will make thieves' clothes, and use the quilting and sewing as the flag. Those who are out of the city are the ones who use the birds." , Remember it."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " scarf " and "戠", the original meaning is banner.
humanum_full_description:
從「巾」，「戠」聲，本義為旗幟。《說文》：「旌旗之屬。从巾，戠聲。」《墨子‧旗幟》：「亭尉各為幟，竿長二丈五，帛長丈五，廣半幅者大。」

　　「幟」也表示標志。《後漢書‧虞詡傳》：「又潛遣貧人能縫者，傭作賊衣，以采綖縫其裾為幟。有出市里者，吏輒禽之。」李賢注：「幟，記也。」

(Simplified: 帜)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 戠 indicates the sound; 巾 (curtain) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 巾 [ jīn ] cloth, curtain, handkerchief, towel
    • 戠 [ zhī ] sword; potter's clay; to gather
①用本義。旗幟的通稱。［例］長丈五尺、廣半幅曰幟。——《墨子》。［例］私記曰幟。——《通俗文》。［例］拔趙幟，立漢赤幟。——《史記·淮陰侯列傳》。［例］樹幟曰。——清·徐珂《清稗類鈔·戰事類》。
②急揮幟。［例］張幟乘潮。——清·邵長蘅《青門剩稿》。［合］：幟羽(羽飾之旌旗)；幟志(旗幟)。
③標記。［例］縫其裾爲幟。——《後漢書》。［合］：幟志(典範，標準)。
(Simplified: 帜)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 戠 indicates the sound; 巾 (curtain) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 6
Chinese: The kazoo fiesta noise is audible from far away and they fashioned streamers out of towels for beckoning visitors in.
Meaning: streamer
Hanzi: 帜
Story: The kazoo fiesta noise is audible from far away and they fashioned streamers out of towels for beckoning visitors in.
Kind: simplified

從「 巾 」，「 戠 」聲，本義為旗幟。《說文》：「旌旗之屬。从巾，戠聲。」《墨子‧旗幟》：「亭尉各為幟，竿長二丈五，帛長丈五，廣半幅者大。」 「 幟 」也表示標志。《後漢書‧虞詡傳》：「又潛遣貧人能縫者，傭作賊衣，以采綖縫其裾為幟。有出市里者，吏輒禽之。」李賢注：「幟，記也。」
From the sound of " scarf" and " 戠", the original meaning is banner. "Said Wen": "The banner belongs to the banner. From the towel, the sound of the warrior." "Mozi‧ Banner": "The pavilion is two feet and five feet long, and the silk is five feet long, and the width is half the size." " Zhang" also means a sign. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty-Yu Xu Biography": "I also subtly send out those who can sew by the poor, and the servants will make thieves' clothes, and use the quilting and sewing as the flag. Those who are out of the city are the ones who use the birds." , Remember it."

幟字的基本解释

幟
zhì
见“帜”。

幟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》昌志切，去志，昌。］
［《廣韻》式吏切，去志，書。］
［《集韻》職吏切，去志，章。］
亦作“旘1”。“帜1”的繁体字。
(1)旗帜。
(2)标志。

幟字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　幟； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页336第21
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?昌志切，音熾。【說文】旌旗之屬。【廣韻】旗幟。【字詁】標也。【廣雅】旛也。【史記·高祖紀】旗幟皆赤。【前漢·淮隂侯傳】拔趙幟，樹漢赤幟。【註】索隱曰：幟帛長丈五，廣半幅。　又通作織。【前漢·食貨志】治樓船十丈餘，加旗織於其上。【註】師古曰：織，讀曰幟。　又記也。【後漢·虞詡傳】以采綖縫其裾爲幟。【註】幟，記也。　又【集韻】【韻會】?職吏切，音志。又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?式吏切，音試。義?同。

幟字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

幟字的起名意思

暂无。
